antcolony
Class Grid

java.lang.Object
  antcolony.Grid

public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object

This is a complex class that not also represents the grid underlying a simulation, but also provides functions for access and manipulation but also other algorithms of the application.

This class is used by all the other classes as a medium for running the simulations

Since:
1.0
Version:
2.1
Author:
António Fonseca

Method Summary
 void calculateClusters()
          Compute the clusters that exist in this grid for measurement purposes, in case of ANTCLASS models make them equal to the already existing heaps in the case LUMERFAIETA apply K-Means to group items by clusters.

          Clear items in the grid

          Decrement the pheromone in all the heaps in this grid.

calculateClusters

public void calculateClusters()
Compute the clusters that exist in this grid for measurement purposes, in case of ANTCLASS models make them equal to the already existing heaps in the case LUMERFAIETA apply K-Means to group items by clusters.

kmeans_heaps

public void kmeans_heaps()
Perform K-Means using heaps centers as seed for K-means clustering, remove all the object from the heaps and cluster in new heaps.

cluster_heaps

public void cluster_heaps()
Cluster the heaps for ANTCLASS2, try to merge heaps that have close centers.
